entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
